carrer.title: Carrer
carrer.description: Below is a summary of my career, professional experience and education.

experience1.title: Android Developer
list: Modularization and of the MVVM architecture

experience2.title: Mid-Level Android Engineer
list: Modularization and of the MVVM architecture
Creation of tests with JUnit 5 and MockK

experience3.title: Junior Android Developer
list: Creation of new features defined by Squad

experience4.title: Intern Android Developer
list: Creation of new features & bug fixes

education1.title: Computer Technician
education1.description: The ETRR helps me learn about technology. I had the opportunity to learn front-end, back-end and mobile development.

education2.title: I study several courses every year
education2.description: I never stop learning! I believe that continuous learning is essential for unlocking our potential in a world of constant change.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here is a gallery with some projects that I developed over time.

project1.name: Marketplace List
project1.description: This simple shopping list App helps you to create your list and already knowing the final value of the purchase!

project3.name: AlvaFlix
project3.description: A joke with my last name Alvarenga with netflix

project4.name: Crypto - UI/UX
project4.description: Fictional project from Felipe Santanas Figma Course (FEUX), with the aim of improving my knowledge in Figma Tool and also in UI and UX.

project5.name: AlvaMessager
project5.description: This app was able to work deeper with firebase, using it as a means of creating a new messaging app (I guess in high school I wasnt creative with names).

project6.name: Time to Sleep
project6.description: This project was developed when I was in the 2nd year of high school, with the aim of being an alarm clock for the deaf!

footer.message:
We shouldn't do things expecting something in return.
Do what needs to be done and the reward will come naturally in its time.
